mapper.select: SELECT location FROM universitysheet GROUP BY location
SELECT university, universityCode AS id, location, property, uType, icon FROM universitysheet WHERE university LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
SELECT university, universityCode AS id, location, property, uType, icon FROM universitysheet WHERE university LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}

SELECT universityCode AS id, university, englishName, establishedTime, location, uType, property, department, website, icon, image, introduction, history FROM universitysheet WHERE universityCode=#{universityCode}
